# FlixSkip

> Auto-skip intros, recaps, credits, and "Are you still watching?" prompts on Netflix

## What is FlixSkip?

FlixSkip is a free browser extension that automatically clicks "Skip Intro", "Skip Recap", and dismisses "Are you still watching?" prompts on Netflix. It works on Chrome, Firefox, Edge, and Brave browsers.

## Features

- **Skip Intro**: Automatically clicks "Skip Intro" the moment the button appears
- **Skip Recap**: Automatically skips "Previously on..." recaps
- **Still Watching**: Dismisses "Are you still watching?" prompts automatically
- **Auto Next Episode**: Jumps to the next episode instantly without waiting for countdown
- **Statistics**: Tracks total skips and time saved
- **100% Private**: No data collection, no analytics, no external servers

## Privacy

FlixSkip does NOT:
- Collect any personal data
- Track your browsing
- Use cookies or analytics
- Make any external network requests

All data stays on your device using browser's built-in storage API.

## Pricing

100% free. No ads. No premium tier. No subscriptions.

## Supported Browsers

- Google Chrome
- Mozilla Firefox
- Microsoft Edge
- Brave
- Opera
- All Chromium-based browsers

## Installation

Install from:
- Chrome Web Store
- Firefox Add-ons
- Edge Add-ons
